feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 12:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 7.4°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon then southwest 20 gusting to 40. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
